div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 21 Koumares, near Trikkala, Thessaly, (575) 1936 Burial: c. 450 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 36 AR Aegina: 34 st. (turtles) 1 st. (tortoise) Chios: 1 archaic st. (intrusion?) Disposition: Athens A letter from W. Schwabacher mentions a hd. of 35 st. of Aegina seen in Athens in 1936
